The photo was published in a Facebook po: 2019, and has been shared more than 3,500 times.
The post: s Hindi-language caption translates to English as: "Brothers, the woman in this photo is the wife of industrialist Adani and the man who has bowed down (sold out) is PM of our country. Why doesn't he fall at her feet."
A reverse image search on Google found t: 2014, with a caption stating that it shows PM Modi greeting Tumkur Mayor Geeta Rudresh.
T: V. Rudresh, the husband of Geeta Rudresh, confirmed that the photo shows his wife meeting Modi in September 2014 when she served as the mayor of Tumkur.
